value:
Did you see Alfonse all dressed up for
the spring festival? My brother looks
so adorable, doesn't he? Hee-hee!

Alfonse was telling me there are
actually Heroes who can turn into
bunnies! I want a bunny pal.

Why don't you dress up like a bunny,
too? It won't be as embarrassing if
we're all in this together!

There you are. Are you ready to
practice? Welcome to Sharena's
bunny hop academy!

My mother loves festivals. I'm sure
she'd be delighted if I dropped by
to say hello dressed like this!

Hoppy spring from a happy bunny!
That was quite the rabbit pun, if I do
say so myself.$k$pOh, right...$Nf
says hello!
Spring is here, everybody!

Clearly, all the effort I put in to
bunny-hop practice has paid off.

The breeze is so warm that it's
making me a little sleepy...
Oooh, I'm just jumping for joy!

Hi there! I'm Princess Sharena of
Askr! I'm ready to hop-hop-hop my
way through the spring festival!

Well, $Nu...
Are you ready to join the bunny
brigade?$k$pCome on now, don't be shy... Just put
this on! Even for a moment...$k$pYou're not up for it? Aww...$k$pYou know, I'm not dressed this way
because I want to be. I just thought it
might make your day a little brighter!$k$pI had to gather up all of my courage
to put this costume on, so...why
don't you join me?$k$pYou aren't buying it, are you? Aww!
I really wanted to see a bunny
summoner!
えーいっ！
ぴょんっ！
きゃああっ！？
Cut it out!
Spring is here!
Spring, spring, spring!
Here comes the sunshine!
I'm hopping your way!
But it's spring!
えへへっ
It's your super bun-bun pal, Sharena!
Agh! You startled me!
I've got the look down, but... What would a bunny rabbit SAY?
You know...this outfit, it's...a little...
You like this outfit? You aren't kidding, are you? You're making me blush!
Well, if I'm going to be a bunny, I want lots of bunny Heroes to be friends with!
Even when spring is over, I'll always be your super bun-bun pal, Sharena!
Here I am!
Hopping to it!
I gotcha!
